amends_amendment.description: Amendment consists of the text of Rules Committee print 114-32, as amended, and which was made in order pursuant to H. Res. 507.
amends_amendment.purpose: An amendment consisting of the text of Rules Committee print 114-32 which shall be considered as pending.

description: Amendment sought to strike the graduated commercial driver's license program language in the bill and replace it with a study on the safety of intrastate teen truck drivers.
purpose: An amendment No. 21 printed in Part A of House Report 114-326 to strike the graduated commercial driver's license program language in H.R. 3763 and replace it with a study on the safety of intrastate teen truck drivers.
